description: This course is a critical investigation into the legal and practical issues raised by climate change in Australia. The course seeks to develop students' knowledge of the array of climate change laws and policies internationally and domestically.
restricted:
GCAppLaw, GDipAppLaw, MAppLaw, LLM, LLM(Adv), LLM(#16), LLM(#24)
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments
